Product_Name: Trudon Cire Candle 3kg
full_description: Deo regique laborant - they work for God and King. Trudon Cire Classic Candle celebrates the humble bee, an integral part of the Maison's history and emblazoned on every candle and box. Scented with warm waxed wood and beeswax absolute, this candle is an ode to the centuries of craftsmanship, and the vitally important creatures that make it possible.What are the notes in Trudon Cire Candle?Head: Bergamot. Waxed Wood. Honey.Heart: Beeswax Absolute. Sandalwood essential oil. Cinnamon essential oil.Base: Tonka Bean. Patchouli essential oil. Musk. Vanilla.Why will I love Trudon Cire Candle 3kg?Burn time of over 300 hoursVegetable wax based candleSmoke free burnArtisanal glass, crafted by hand in Vinci, ItalyCotton wick adapted to each fragranceGreat style candle, 21.5cm height and 18cm diameter3kg Cire Trudon: Candles With HistoryOnce, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Cire Trudon candles are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the Latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.” How do I care for my Cire Trudon candles?The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot.When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.

Product_Name: Alpha-H Liquid Gold Trial Kit
Skin Concern: Dull, dry or dehydrated skin, First signs of ageing, Pigmentation, uneven skin tone
Skin Type: Dry, Normal to dry, Normal to oily, Oily
full_description: Experience the iconic radiance-boosting goodness of Liquid Gold for yourself. The cult favourite Alpha-H Liquid Gold is a skin rejuvenating powerhouse, containing 5% Glycolic Acid and Licorice Extract to exfoliate skin and reveal a more toned and satin-smooth appearance. Alpha H Liquid Gold works like an at-home chemical exfoliant with the AHA Glycolic Acid, gently clearing away dead skin cells and debris, improving skin tone and texture while it's at it. This Alpha-H Liquid Gold Trial Kit includes 9 single-use satchets to reveal gorgeous luminous skin in 21 days. Simply swipe a pre-soaked cotton pad onto the face like you would a toner and enjoy the glow-boosting benefits. What are the key benefits of the Alpha-H Liquid Gold Trial Kit?Radiance boosting trial kitResurfaces and brightens dull-looking skinRejuvenates ageing skinSmooths out the appearance of fine linesStrengthens the skin's barrierImproves the appearance of pigmentation, age spots and blemish scarringSkin tone becomes visibly brighter, smoother and clearerRecommended for the signs of sun damageWhat are the key ingredients of the Alpha-H Liquid Gold?Glycolic ExtractA type of Alpha Hydroxy Acid, glycolic acid works to exfoliate and brighten the appearance of skin tone and texture. It has a small molecular size to penetrate deep into the dermis and also acts like a delivery vehicle for other ingredients.Licorice ExtractIts soothing and brightening properties work to improve the appearance of dark spots and the visible signs of aging.Silk ProteinsThe natural amino acid and lipid oil content bind moisture, improving skin clarity, radiance and texture.GlycerinA powerful humectant that works to draw and bind moisture from the air into the surface levels of the skin, helping to maintain moisture balance.How do you use Alpha-H Liquid Gold?The Alpha-H Liquid Gold should be applied every second evening after cleansing.Simply swipe a pre-soaked pad onto a clean face (avoiding the eye area). Feel the tingle in 3 seconds. Notice a visible glow in 3 nights (or less!). See skin transformed in just 3 weeks.If you'd like to experience the full effects of the Liquid Gold it's recommended that you don't use any other products after use, however if your skin is more sensitive, applying a moisturiser or serum afterward will help dull the strength. It's normal to experience a tingling sensation for a few minutes after the application of Alpha H Liquid Gold.

Product_Name: OPI xPRESS/on Nail Art SO INTO BLUE
full_description: There's instant, and then there's instant - introducing OPI XPRESS/On Nail Art. These high quality press-on nails make a gel-like, salon-quality manicure quick and easy to apply, and deliver 14 days of stunning wear - plus, nails can be reused again and again.   Available in a selection of designs ranging from the classic French Press to the fun Tastes Like Strawberries, with both short classic options as well as long, almond-shaped nails.Ready to switch things up? Continue the fun with XPRESS/On Effects, or find favourite OPI shades in Long and Short lengths.Each kit includes everything you need for perfect application, with 30 nails in different sizes, nail glue, a prep pad, cuticle stick and duo file/buffer.Why will I love OPI xPRESS/on Nail Art?Press-on nail kitFast and easy to applyRe-usable Each application provides 14 days of wearAvailable in a range of fun and elegant styles including glittery tips and the classic French maniShorter, rounded shapes as well as longer, almond-shaped designsAlso available in Iconic Shades Short, Iconic Shades Long and EffectsVeganContains 30 nails, 2g nail glue, dual file/buffer, cuticle stick and prep padHow to apply OPI xPRESS/on Nail Art:First, find your fit - cover your natural nail with each press-on to find the perfect size.If desired, shape the end of your press-on with the Shape Up side of the file.File or clip your natural nails as needed, and lightly buff the surface of the nail.Remove dust and debris from natural nails with the included prep pad, then gently push back cuticles with the included stick.Remove the glue cap and gently squeeze the bottle. For longer wear, apply glue both to the back of the press-on nail and your natural nail. For short term wear, only apply glue to the press-on nail.Place press-on nails onto natural nails and hold down gently for 30 seconds.To remove, soak nails in warm water for 10 minutes, then use the cuticle stick to gently lift off. If needed, you can apply a small amount of acetone to the nail base using a cotton swab.

Product_Name: Trudon Cyrnos Petit Candle 70gm
full_description: A sunny, verdant scented candle from Cire Trudon, in a petite 70gm size.  A sunny little villa in Cyrnos, surrounded by deep blue Mediterranean shores. A gentle salt breeze in a verdant garden. The aroma of Provence, dappled sunlight through a citrus garden. Cire Trudon Cyrnos Petit Candle is a fresh aromatic citrus candle with a base of green woods. A single wick, vegetable wax candle, Cire Trudon candles are known for their evocative qualities, with Cyrnos bringing forth a sense of summer in paradise. More than a simple citrus aromatic candle, Cyrnos expertly blends green notes of pine and thyme, interwoven with cashmere wood and cedarwood for a complex fragrance journey. What are the notes of Cire Trudon Cyrnos Candle?Head: Lemon. Myrtle. Thyme.Heart: Black fig. Cedarwood. Lavender. Pine.Base: Cashmere wood. Musk. Patchouli.What are the features & benefits of Cire Trudon Cyrnos Candle Classic?18 to 20 hour burn timeVegetable wax based candleSmoke free burnArtisanal glass, crafted by hand in Vinci, ItalyCotton wick adapted to each fragrancePetite size candle, 70gm Cire Trudon: Candles With HistoryOnce, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Cire Trudon candles are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.” How do I care for my Cire Trudon candles?The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot.When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.
how_to_use: How do I care for my Cire Trudon candles? The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot. When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.If this product is sealed, please ensure the seal is intact prior to using the product.
